result.eng: I put all the money on the horse.
result.ga: Chuir mé an t-airgead go léir ar an chapall
result.orig: Chuir mé an t-airgead go léir ar an chapall
result.html: Chuir mé an t-airgead go léir ar an chapallI put all the money on the horse.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir mé an t-airgead go léir ar an ċapallI put all the money on the horse.

result.eng: It was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.
result.ga: Ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaí
result.orig: Ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaí
result.html: Ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaíIt was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.
result.ponchtml: Ba léir go raiḃ tú idir ḋá ċoṁairle maidir leis an ḟreagra is oiriúnaíIt was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.

result.eng: It was obvious that they had broken the law.
result.ga: Ba léir gur sháraigh siad an dlí
result.orig: Ba léir gur sháraigh siad an dlí
result.html: Ba léir gur sháraigh siad an dlíIt was obvious that they had broken the law.
result.ponchtml: Ba léir gur ẛáraiġ siad an dlíIt was obvious that they had broken the law.

result.eng: All the names were listed on the page.
result.ga: Bhí na hainmneacha go léir liostaithe ar an leathanach
result.orig: Bhí na hainmneacha go léir liostaithe ar an leathanach
result.html: Bhí na hainmneacha go léir liostaithe ar an leathanachAll the names were listed on the page.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na hainmneaċa go léir liostaiṫe ar an leaṫanaċAll the names were listed on the page.

result.ga: Chaill mé an t-airgead go léir
result.orig: Chaill mé an t-airgead go léir
result.html: Chaill mé an t-airgead go léirI lost all the money.
result.ponchtml: Ċaill mé an t-airgead go léirI lost all the money.

result.eng: He visited his children, all of them married by that time.
result.ga: Chuir sé cuairt ar a chlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sin
result.orig: Chuir sé cuairt ar a chlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sin
result.html: Chuir sé cuairt ar a chlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sinHe visited his children, all of them married by that time.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sé cuairt ar a ċlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sinHe visited his children, all of them married by that time.

result.eng: The meaning of the sentence is unclear to me.
result.ga: Ní léir dom ciall na habairte
result.orig: Ní léir dom ciall na habairte
result.html: Ní léir dom ciall na habairteThe meaning of the sentence is unclear to me.
result.ponchtml: Ní léir dom ciall na habairteThe meaning of the sentence is unclear to me.

result.eng: It is clear that we have made a mistake.
result.ga: Is léir go bhfuil botún déanta againn
result.orig: Is léir go bhfuil botún déanta againn
result.html: Is léir go bhfuil botún déanta againnIt is clear that we have made a mistake.
result.ponchtml: Is léir go ḃfuil botún déanta againnIt is clear that we have made a mistake.

result.eng: We can see from the traces they left behind that there were two of them.
result.ga: Is léir ó na rianta a d'fhág siad ina ndiaidh gur beirt a bhí ann
result.orig: Is léir ó na rianta a d'fhág siad ina ndiaidh gur beirt a bhí ann
result.html: Is léir ó na rianta a d'fhág siad ina ndiaidh gur beirt a bhí annWe can see from the traces they left behind that there were two of them.
result.ponchtml: Is léir ó na rianta a d'ḟág siad ina ndiaiḋ gur beirt a ḃí annWe can see from the traces they left behind that there were two of them.

result.ga: Is neacha básmhara muid go léir
result.orig: Is neacha básmhara muid go léir
result.html: Is neacha básmhara muid go léirWe are all mortal creatures.
result.ponchtml: Is neaċa básṁara muid go léirWe are all mortal creatures.

result.html: Na daoine seo go léirAll these people.
result.ponchtml: Na daoine seo go léirAll these people.

result.eng: Not all pupils are present yet.
result.ga: Níl na daltaí go léir i láthair go fóill
result.orig: Níl na daltaí go léir i láthair go fóill
result.html: Níl na daltaí go léir i láthair go fóillNot all pupils are present yet.
result.ponchtml: Níl na daltaí go léir i láṫair go fóillNot all pupils are present yet.

result.eng: I hope you didn't steal all the money.
result.ga: Tá súil agam nár ghoid tú an t-airgead sin go léir
result.orig: Tá súil agam nár ghoid tú an t-airgead sin go léir
result.html: Tá súil agam nár ghoid tú an t-airgead sin go léirI hope you didn't steal all the money.
result.ponchtml: Tá súil agam nár ġoid tú an t-airgead sin go léirI hope you didn't steal all the money.

result.eng: Did you do all the work?
result.ga: An ndearna sibh an obair go léir
result.orig: An ndearna sibh an obair go léir
result.html: An ndearna sibh an obair go léirDid you do all the work?
result.ponchtml: An ndearna siḃ an obair go léirDid you do all the work?

result.eng: 'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ga: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.orig: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.html: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ag teaċt faoinár ndéin liúiġ duine de na fir óga agus ḃí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.

result.eng: I obviously have a large imagination.
result.ga: Tá samhlaíocht láidir agam mar is léir
result.orig: Tá samhlaíocht láidir agam mar is léir
result.html: Tá samhlaíocht láidir agam mar is léirI obviously have a large imagination.
result.ponchtml: Tá saṁlaíoċt láidir agam mar is léirI obviously have a large imagination.

result.eng: When he was 11 years of age, the whole family moved to France.
result.ga: Nuair a bhí sé 11 bliain d'aois bhog an teaghlach go léir go dtí an Fhrainc
result.orig: Nuair a bhí sé 11 bliain d'aois bhog an teaghlach go léir go dtí an Fhrainc
result.html: Nuair a bhí sé 11 bliain d'aois bhog an teaghlach go léir go dtí an FhraincWhen he was 11 years of age, the whole family moved to France.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ḃí sé 11 bliain d'aois ḃog an teaġlaċ go léir go dtí an ḞraincWhen he was 11 years of age, the whole family moved to France.

result.eng: The whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.
result.ga: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sin
result.orig: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sin
result.html: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sinThe whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan an tír go léir faoi ḋianslándáil ar feaḋ tamaill ḟada ina ḋiaiḋ sinThe whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.

result.eng: Clearly, the United States of America were planning a big revenge.
result.ga: Ba léir go raibh Stáit Aontaithe Mheiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollmhóir
result.orig: Ba léir go raibh Stáit Aontaithe Mheiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollmhóir
result.html: Ba léir go raibh Stáit Aontaithe Mheiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollmhóirClearly, the United States of America were planning a big revenge.
result.ponchtml: Ba léir go raiḃ Stáit Aontaiṫe Ṁeiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollṁóirClearly, the United States of America were planning a big revenge.
